headline: UBS Sees Margin Upside for Devon Energy (DVN) Amid Expense Savings
summary: Devon Energy Corporation (NYSE:DVN) ranks among the best growth stocks to buy for the next 10 years. On July 11, UBS maintained its Neutral rating on Devon Energy Corporation (NYSE:DVN) and increased its price target to $37 from $35. Devon Energy has outperformed the XOP by over 400 basis points year-t-date, which UBS credits to […]
